scripts.buildMocks: npm run build -w packages/mocks && npm run echoFinish
scripts.buildServices: npm run build -w packages/services && npm run echoFinish
scripts.buildStores: npm run build -w packages/stores && npm run echoFinish
scripts.buildTypes: npm run build -w packages/types && npm run echoFinish
scripts.build: npm run buildMocks && npm run buildServices && npm run buildStores && npm run buildTypes && node ./buildScript
